name: .TRASH
summary: Learn about .TRASH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: After choosing to show hidden files in the ChromeOS Files app, you can open and navigate the .Trash folder as you would any other folder. To restore trashed files, you should use the Files app's primary Trash folder.

images.alt: TRASH folder open in ChromeOS Files
images.caption: TRASH folder open in ChromeOS Files
